description: porcelain ewer with white glaze; spherical body with tapered foot and neck to wide mouth; a small cylindrical spout comes off the body just above the shoulder and a double reed handle attached above midbody raises straight up even with rim and attached to lower neck; banding above should to neck; white glazed ding-type ewer
medium:
Ting ware
Porcelaneous stoneware, white glaze
title: Ewer
